snippet.title: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves Remastered Trailer
snippet.description:
THE ADVENTURE CONTINUES…

Reacquaint yourself with fortune hunter Nathan Drake through a tale of life-threatening danger, exotic locations and heroic rescue missions.

Experience the classic PlayStation®3 adventure, now on PlayStation®4: http://www.game.co.uk/en/uncharted-2-among-thieves-remastered-1716383
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Follow us on:

Main Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/game
Twitter: @GAMEdigital
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GAMEstore
Instagram: @gamedigital
